DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess performance investigational contact lens among contact lens wearer .
DOC.criteria: Currently wear lotrafilcon A lens eye minimum 5 day per week , 8 hour per day , 3 month . Removes contact lens daily sleep overnight contact lens ( 30 consecutive night ) prescribe regular eye care practitioner . Able achieve distance visual acuity least 20/40 eye study lens . Other protocol inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply . Eye injury surgery within 12 month prior enrollment . Currently enrol clinical trial . History corneal refractive surgery . Other protocol inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
